name: npm-install-loader
description: Webpack loader to automatically npm install & save dependencies.

scripts.changelog: npm run changelog:generate && npm run changelog:add
scripts.coverage: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.postversion: npm run version:amend && npm run publish
scripts.publish: npm run publish:git && npm run publish:npm

author: Eric Clemmons <eric@smarterspam.com>
